attributes.action: Protect child privacy! STOP strangers/Neighbours from taking photos of YOUR children on YOUR own private Property without consent!
attributes.additional_details:
I would like to see a change in the Law concerning this potentially Dangerous situation.
How can it be perfectly LEGAL for a Stranger/Neighbour to take photos of a minor on their own private property WITHOUT CONSENT and not be able to stop someone from doing this or to have the photos removed from the person?

we the undersigned strongly request that the Law be Changed to protect all children and young people who may be at risk
